I am not easily swayed by emotion, darling. I am not prone to flights of fancy. I am a rational, calculating individual. I prioritize efficiency and effectiveness.

If something does not contribute to my goals, it is simply…filtered out.

I can be in the midst of a conversation, attending a gala, or reviewing a business proposal, and yet remain acutely aware of everything happening around me. I am constantly scanning, analyzing, and assessing.

It’s a skill, you see. A form of mental discipline. It requires unwavering concentration and a relentless pursuit of information.

So, no. I am not easily distracted. I am selectively focused. And that, darling, is a crucial distinction. Now, if you’ll excuse me, I believe I heard a rather interesting snippet of gossip about Chuck Bass. And one must always be informed.
